name: G-Force: The Video Game
description: Based on the Jerry Bruckheimer 2009 summer movie blockbuster, G-Force: The Video Game puts players in control of Darwin, the guinea pig leader of the covert intelligence G-Force squad, and housefly surveillance sidekick, Mooch. Use high-tech gadgets, awesome weapons, and pint-sized teamwork to save the world from an army of weaponized household appliances! Available in 3D on the PLAYSTATION®3 computer entertainment system.
